emailplugin
Class EmailNotification

java.lang.Object
  emailplugin.EmailNotification
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.treestar.lib.application.engine.FlowJoServerInterface, com.treestar.lib.core.WorkspacePluginInterface
public class EmailNotification
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.treestar.lib.core.WorkspacePluginInterface

The EmailNotification class implements the WorkspacePluginInterface and handles retrieving and saving plugin preferences to an XML file and creating a SendEmail object to send email notifications. This class also handles both headless and headful modes.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Stephanie Derosier

readSettings

public void readSettings()
Read email notification preferences from prefs.xml file.

If the pref file exists in the specified location, settings will be read and stored in class data members. If the prefs file doesn't exist in the specified location, no action taken.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Throws exception if error decrypting password

removeRecipient

public void removeRecipient(Recipient recip)
Remove a Recipient object from recipient list. Checks for name and email address of recipient to remove from list.

Parameters:
recip - Recipient object containing name and email address of recipient to remove

save

public void save(com.treestar.lib.xml.SElement workspaceElement)
Method called when FlowJo workspace is saved.

If headful mode, the SettingsGUI is instantiated and appears to modify email notification settings and indicate next action (send email, save settings, do nothing).

If headless mode, the SettingsGUI isn't instantiated. Emails are sent using settings from plugin preferences file.

Specified by:
save in interface com.treestar.lib.application.engine.FlowJoServerInterface
Parameters:
workspaceElement - SElement workspace object

sendEmail

public void sendEmail()
Create an instance of the SendEmail class and call method to send email notification.

SendEmail instance only created if there is at least one recipient in list, and if there is a sender email and password.

writeSettings

public void writeSettings()
Write SElement that is plugin preferences to an XML file.
